Plastic.name: Plastic
Plastic.description: An assortment of petrochemical polymers. A common material that can be found throughout the train from shops, dispensers, nodes, pickups, trashbags, and breaking furniture.

Metal.name: Metal
Metal.description: A heterogenous mixture of metal scrap, mostly iron and copper. A common material that can be found throughout the train from shops, dispensers, nodes, pickups, trashbags, and breaking furniture.

Chemicals.name: Chemicals
Chemicals.description: A condensate of non-methane volatile organic compounds. A common material that can be found throughout the train from shops, dispensers, nodes, pickups, trashbags, and breaking furniture. They can also be purchased from resource shops from second class onwards.

Ceramics.name: Ceramics
Ceramics.description: An extremely hard sintered material with a range of structural and high-power electronics applications. An uncommon material found only in second and first class carriges from shops, dispensers, nodes, pickups, and breaking furniture

Exotic_Metal.name: Exotic Metal
Exotic_Metal.description: A small piece of rare-earth metal. A rare material only found in first class carriges as a potential from nodes and breaking furniture

Parts.name: Parts
Parts.description: Can be salvaged for resources in a Recycler, or analyzed in a Research Station to grant a random Tech.

Common_Isotope.name: Common Isotope
Common_Isotope.description: Very rare drop from nodes and meganodes

Seed_Bird_of_Paradise.name: Seed - Bird of Paradise
Seed_Bird_of_Paradise.description: Can be purchased from food dispensers, or from vending machines in the C2 and C4 shopping mall.

Soil.name: Soil
Soil.description: Turn food and drink into soil in a Gardening Station.

Mysterious_Fruit.name: Mysterious Fruit
Mysterious_Fruit.description: Fruit that can be grown from the Mysterious Plant.
